nodes.text: The Trade Federation ceremonial cruiser was a vast, elegant 1,000-passenger ceremonial cruiser "rated at Class Two."

The luxurious passenger liner was designed by Raith Sienar during the waning years of the Galactic Republic, to be used for triumphal receptions on worlds signing exclusive contracts with the Trade Federation. Sienar considered it to be, as of 29 BBY, his "most beautiful"—and "largest"—creation, to date.
